```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Load Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Load Dataset
```{r}
(data<-read_csv("data/lpi_2015_to_2017_join_gps_density.txt"))
```

##SageBrush Analysis
```{r}
sage_subset<-data%>%
  select(PlotID:PlotKey, ARNO4, ARTR2, RASTERVALU)%>%
  rename(grouse_dense=RASTERVALU)%>%
  filter(grouse_dense>0)%>%
  mutate(sage_total=ARNO4+ARTR2)
```

## Plot
```{r}
ggplot(sage_subset, aes(x=grouse_dense, y=ARTR2))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()
```

## ARNO 4
```{r}
ggplot(sage_subset, aes(x=grouse_dense, y=ARNO4))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()

```

sage_total
```{r}
sage_subset
ggplot(sage_subset, aes(x=grouse_dense, y=sage_total))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()
```
